title: Cost allocation rule workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a cost allocation rule record. You can manually trigger the transitions between phases.

Metaphase: Draft                                                                                                                                                                      

Phase Transition Description
Draft Manual

The starting point for a cost allocation rule.

To make the cost allocation rule active, manually transition it to the Active phase.

To retire the cost allocation rule, manually transition it to the Retired phase.

Next phase: Active or Retired

Metaphase: Active                                                                                                                                                                               

Phase Transition Description
Active Manual The cost allocation rule is active.    

To make the cost allocation rule inactive, manually transition it to the Retired phase.     

To move the cost allocation rule back to the previous phase or edit the cost allocation rule, manually transition it to the Draft phase.        

Next phase: Retired or Draft

Metaphase: Retired (End)                                                                                                                        

Phase Transition Description
Retired Manual

The cost allocation rule is inactive.

Next phase: None
